form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Form G-135a, Director, Central Intelligence Agency

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/24/2023 Form G-135a Agency Name Check (Rev. 10-1-65) Office LOS UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE File No. Immigration and Naturalization Service A13 559853 TC-ECM DIRECTOR, CENTRAL INTELLIGENCE AGENCY Date 2430 E Street, N.W., March 15, 1966 Washington, D. C. 20505 Attention: DEPUTY DIRECTOR, PLANS Please furnish any derogatory information that may be contained in your files concerning the following person. FBI Ident. Number (LAST NAME) (FIRST NAME) (MIDDLE NAME) DATE OF BIRTH PRESENT NATIONALITY WONG, Man Get 8-22-14 China PLACE OF BIRTH MARITAL STATUS OTHER NAMES USED (Maiden name, names by former marriages, former names changed legally Toushan Kwangtung, China SINGLE WIDOW(ER) or otherwise, aliases, nicknames, etc. Specify which, and show dates used.) MALE FEMALE MARRIED DIVORCED HEIGHT WEIGHT COLOR COLOR IDENTIFYING MARKS EYES HAIR 515" 120 Brn. Blk. None IF MARRIED, WIDOWED, OR DIVORCED, GIVE FULL NAME AND DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH OF SPOUSE OR FORMER SPOUSE. INCLUDE WIFE'S MAIDEN NAME. GIVE DATES AND PLACES OF ALL MARRIAGES OR DIVORCES. Pui Fun Yu 4-21-20 Canton, China Married: 4-10-43 PARENTS NAMES (Last name) (First name) DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH (If known) ADDRESS Father Wong, Chau Wah Mother Wong, Chuen 01 ORGANIZATIONS (Include any societies, clubs, etc., with which now or previously affiliated) None RESIDENCE LAST (5) (7) YEARS (Street & No., RFD, etc.) (City, state and country) FROM TO 854 N. Crescent Hgts. Blvd. Los Angeles, Calif. U.S.A. 12-65 Present 59581 Franklin /Ave. Hollywood, Calif. 11-62 2-64 124 Taipe Rd. Kowloon, Hong Kong 10-57 11-62 EMPLOYMENT LAST (5) (7) YEARS (Employer's name) (Number, street, city, state) FROM TO Wayne Chong Laundry 8038 Santa Monica Blvd. 12-65 Present Harvey's Laundry 8820 Burton Way Beverly Hills, Calif. 1-63 10-65 E. Hollywood Dental Lab. 4469 Santa Monica 1-64 7-64 LAST ADMISSION TO U.S. (Date, port and status) PRIOR ENTRIES AND DEPARTURES (Dates and ports or if numerous, list years when previously in U.S.) Honolulu, Hawaii 11-16-62 TC-HK U.S. PASSPORT NO. (If known) SOCIAL SECURITY # REASON FOR REQUEST ARMED FORCES SERIAL # DEPORTATION ADM. TO U. S. AND BRANCH OF SERVICE BENEF. PB #: NATURALIZATION ADJ. OF STATUS SPONSOR PB #: NOT TO BE SHOWN TO APPLICANT FOR CONDITIONAL ENTRY FOR RELIEF OF FOREIGN NATIONALS RETURN TO U. S. Immigration and Naturalization Service 119 D St., N.E. Assistant Commissioner Washington, D. C. 20536 Investigations FOR AGENCY REPLY NO PERTINENT IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION MAR 25 1966 BENEFIT-OF-SPELLING VARIANTS REQUEST SEARCHED WIOUT CENTRAL INTELLIGENCE AGENCY (3)
